Row.Text: Can only have 1 City. Towns cannot use Convert to City. Receive additional Science when pillaging Buildings or Improvements equal to the Yield or Healing gained.

[LIST][LI]Can only have 1 City. Towns cannot use [B]Convert to City[/B].[LI]Gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] [B]Science [/B]when [B]pillaging [/B]Buildings or Improvements equal to the yield or healing gained.[/B][LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing [B]Trelleborg[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Vikings's associated Wonder.
